languages.text: Среди старинного оружия вы узнаете булаву Феррум Фатум. По легенде, ее навершие раскололось, пробив череп омерзительного демона Бреназзара Свежевателя.

traits.locale_text: Среди старинного оружия вы узнаете булаву Феррум Фатум. По легенде, ее навершие раскололось, пробив череп омерзительного демона Бреназзара Свежевателя.

languages.text: Among the antique weapons, you spot the maul known as the Ferrum Fatum. Legend has it that its head split when it cracked open the skull of the loathsome daemon Brenazzar the Flayer.
languages.original_text: Среди старинного оружия вы узнаете булаву Феррум Фатум. По легенде, ее навершие раскололось, пробив череп омерзительного демона Бреназзара Свежевателя.

traits.locale_text: Among the antique weapons, you spot the maul known as the Ferrum Fatum. Legend has it that its head split when it cracked open the skull of the loathsome daemon Brenazzar the Flayer.

Among the exquisitely crafted weapons, you spot the mace known as the Ferrum Fatum. Legend has it that it would appear in the hand of a righteous warrior during great battles against enemies of Humanity.
Among the antique weapons, you spot the maul known as the Ferrum Fatum. Legend has it that its head split when it cracked open the skull of the loathsome daemon Brenazzar the Flayer.

Under the thick glass cover lies a partly fused bionic hand prosthesis, its fingers frozen in a death grip. You recollect the legend of a nameless martyr who detonated himself in the middle of a throng of heretics. His body was shredded, but a prosthesis was recovered and became known as the Ferrum Fatum.
Among the antique weapons, you spot the maul known as the Ferrum Fatum. Legend has it that its head split when it cracked open the skull of the loathsome daemon Brenazzar the Flayer.

Among the exquisitely crafted weapons, you spot the mace known as the Ferrum Fatum. Legend has it that it would appear in the hand of a righteous warrior during great battles against enemies of Humanity.

Among the exquisitely crafted weapons, you spot the mace known as the Ferrum Fatum. Legend has it that it would appear in the hand of a righteous warrior during great battles against enemies of Humanity.
Among the antique weapons, you spot the maul known as the Ferrum Fatum. Legend has it that its head split when it cracked open the skull of the loathsome daemon Brenazzar the Flayer.
Among the antique weapons, you spot the maul known as the Ferrum Fatum. Legend has it that its head split when it cracked open the skull of the loathsome daemon Brenazzar the Flayer.
Among the antique weapons, you spot the maul known as the Ferrum Fatum. Legend has it that its head split when it cracked open the skull of the loathsome daemon Brenazzar the Flayer.

languages.text: Entre las armas expuestas, reconoces la maza conocida como Ferrum Fatum. Según cuenta la leyenda, se partió al abrir la cabeza del terrible daemon Brenazzar el Desollador.
languages.original_text: Among the antique weapons, you spot the maul known as the Ferrum Fatum. Legend has it that its head split when it cracked open the skull of the loathsome daemon Brenazzar the Flayer.

traits.locale_text: Entre las armas expuestas, reconoces la maza conocida como Ferrum Fatum. Según cuenta la leyenda, se partió al abrir la cabeza del terrible daemon Brenazzar el Desollador.

languages.text: 古びた武器の中に、フェルム・ファタムという名のモールが目に留まった。伝説によるとモールの頭部は、忌まわしきディーモン、フレイヤーのブレナザーの頭蓋骨を割ったときにヒビが入ったという。
languages.original_text: Among the antique weapons, you spot the maul known as the Ferrum Fatum. Legend has it that its head split when it cracked open the skull of the loathsome daemon Brenazzar the Flayer.

traits.locale_text: アンティークの武器の中に、フェルム・ファタムと呼ばれるモールを見つけた。伝説によれば、その頭部は、憎むべきディーモンのブレナザー・ザ・フレイヤーの頭蓋骨を割ったときに割れたという。

languages.text: 在这些古董武器之中，你发现了一把被称为“命运圣铁”的战锤。传闻声称，这把武器砸开了邪恶的恶魔“剥皮者布伦纳扎”的头骨，它的锤头也砸裂了。
languages.original_text: Among the antique weapons, you spot the maul known as the Ferrum Fatum. Legend has it that its head split when it cracked open the skull of the loathsome daemon Brenazzar the Flayer.

traits.locale_text: 在这些古董武器之中，你发现了一把被称为“命运圣铁”的战锤。传闻声称，这把武器砸开了邪恶的恶魔“剥皮者布伦纳扎”的头骨，它的锤头也砸裂了。

languages.text: Zwischen den antiquierten Waffen entdeckst du den als Ferrum Fatum bekannten Hammer. Der Legende nach wurde sein Kopf gespalten, als er einem abscheulichen Dämon namens Brenazzar der Schinder den Schädel einschlug.
languages.original_text: Among the antique weapons, you spot the maul known as the Ferrum Fatum. Legend has it that its head split when it cracked open the skull of the loathsome daemon Brenazzar the Flayer.

traits.locale_text: Zwischen den antiquierten Waffen entdeckst du den als Ferrum Fatum bekannten Hammer. Der Legende nach wurde sein Kopf gespalten, als er einem abscheulichen Dämon namens Brenazzar der Schinder den Schädel einschlug.

languages.text: Parmi les armes anciennes, vous repérez la masse connue sous le nom de Ferrum Fatum. À en croire la légende, sa tête se serait fendue en ouvrant le crâne de l'infâme démon Brenazzar l'Écorcheur.
languages.original_text: Among the antique weapons, you spot the maul known as the Ferrum Fatum. Legend has it that its head split when it cracked open the skull of the loathsome daemon Brenazzar the Flayer.

traits.locale_text: Parmi les armes anciennes, vous repérez la masse connue sous le nom de Ferrum Fatum. À en croire la légende, sa tête se serait fendue en ouvrant le crâne de l'infâme démon Brenazzar l'Écorcheur.

languages.text: Antika silahlar arasında Ferrum Fatum olarak bilinen tokmağı fark ediyorsun. Efsaneye göre Deri Yüzen Brenazzar adındaki menfur bir iblisin kafatasını parçalarken üst kısmı ikiye ayrılmış.
languages.original_text: Among the antique weapons, you spot the maul known as the Ferrum Fatum. Legend has it that its head split when it cracked open the skull of the loathsome daemon Brenazzar the Flayer.
